        int getTimedInt()
         throws java.io.IOException,
                NoInputException
        Reads a int, if it is not entered within a certain time it stops waiting for input
        Returns:
        the int read
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - in case of reading problems
        NoInputException - if the input is not entered in the time provided
